description: Try our easy to follow Rockmelon, Prosciutto & Radish Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rockmelon, Prosciutto & Radish Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 bunch red radishes, washed, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place oil, lemon juice, orange juice and mustard in a small screw-top jar. Season with sea salt and ground black pepper. Shake well to combine and set aside.
Divide the rockmelon, prosciutto, rocket leaves and radish among serving plates.
Drizzle with dressing. Season with freshly ground black pepper and garnish with parsley leaves.
